channel.title: wordpress plugins on Reflections
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress plugins on Reflections

item.title: Friendfeed comments for wordpress
item.description: Conversations on the web have evolved quite a bit, in the last 4/5 years. During the late 90s, conversations on the web, was pretty much non-existant, except for a few, who used their websites to engage in conversations. The advent of the blog, made available tools to start and continue conversations. In the last couple of years, there has been several attempts to normalize comments, across the blogging ecosystem, and several ways have been tried.

item.title: Ipod touch/Iphone support
item.description: This website, now supports a special interface for viewing using√Ç ipod touch/iphone. I’m using the iWPhone plugin at contentrobot.com
